attributes.name: GCP Storage Bucket Configuration Modification v102.0.2
attributes.description: Identifies when the configuration is modified for a storage bucket in Google Cloud Platform (GCP). An adversary may modify the configuration of a storage bucket in order to weaken the security controls of their target's environment.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Storage bucket configuration may be modified by system administrators. Verify that the configuration change was expected. Exceptions can be added to this rule to filter expected behavior.
attributes.setup: The GCP Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
